column1: A cronjob is a daemon which continues running and gets activated at a certain interval (time period). Please ensure that your default Magento Cron is working. If not, contact your hosting company for help.
column2: A cronjob is a daemon which continues running and gets activated at a certain interval (time period). Please ensure that your default Magento Cron is working. If not, contact your hosting company for help.

column1: Connect the right attributes for the name and description to export the values to the Sooqr feed. The description will be truncated to a maximum of 5000 characters and stripped from html.
column2: Connect the right attributes for the name and description to export the values to the Sooqr feed. The description will be truncated to a maximum of 5000 characters and stripped from html.

column1: Enable or disable the feed generation for this store view or change the filename.
column2: Enable or disable the feed generation for this store view or change the filename.

column1: Exclude products that are out of stock in your store.
column2: Exclude products that are out of stock in your store.

column1: File not found, please generate new feed.
column2: File not found, please generate new feed.

column1: Include or exclude products based on the category.
column2: Include or exclude products based on the category.

column1: Include or exclude products based on the visibility.
column2: Include or exclude products based on the visibility.

column1: Only add products with the following Visibility
column2: Only add products with the following Visibility

column1: Please enable the extension before generating the feed.
column2: Please enable the extension before generating the feed.

column1: Successfully generated a feed with %1 product(s).
column2: Successfully generated a feed with %1 product(s).

column1: Use Parent Product Data for Simple Products
column2: Use Parent Product Data for Simple Products

column1: Use the paging function on big catalogs, e.g. catalogs of 50.000 SKU, use 5.000 per page.
column2: Use the paging function on big catalogs, e.g. catalogs of 50.000 SKU, use 5.000 per page.

column1: We can't generate the feed right now.
column2: We can't generate the feed right now.

column1: We can't save the cron expression.
column2: We can't save the cron expression.

column1: When your using configurable or grouped products the simple products will be shown in the feed by default. You can choose to pull the information from the parent products. Select the fall-back data for the configurable / grouped products in the multiple-select box below.
column2: When your using configurable or grouped products the simple products will be shown in the feed by default. You can choose to pull the information from the parent products. Select the fall-back data for the configurable / grouped products in the multiple-select box below.

column1: Write the memory usage to the var/log/sooqr.log file
column2: Write the memory usage to the var/log/sooqr.log file

column1: You can add custom fields to your feed when needed. Please make sure that your using the latest custom fields standards to prevent error messages in the feed. The guidelines for the custom fields can be found right in our knowledgebase.
column2: You can add custom fields to your feed when needed. Please make sure that your using the latest custom fields standards to prevent error messages in the feed. The guidelines for the custom fields can be found right in our knowledgebase.

column1: You can find your Sooqr Account ID in your Sooqr account, you can find the link in the information box at the top of this page. Your Sooqr Account ID should look like SQ-12345-1.
column2: You can find your Sooqr Account ID in your Sooqr account, you can find the link in the information box at the top of this page. Your Sooqr Account ID should look like SQ-12345-1.
